advice: If you're being harassed online, block the user and report them immediately.
Hateful content can be reported directly to platforms. Here's how to report on Twitter.
Check facts before sharing. Use verified sources like Snopes or FactCheck.org.
You're not alone. Reach out to support organizations like Mental Health America.
Protect your personal information. Never share sensitive details publicly.
Be cautious of suspicious links and requests for personal information.
It's okay to seek help with schoolwork. Talk to teachers or counselors.
Everyone is unique and valuable. Focus on health, not appearance standards.
